summary: Delaware is a small state in the northeast of the United States, known as "The First State" as it was the first to ratify the U.S. Constitution. It borders Maryland, Pennsylvania, New Jersey, and the Atlantic Ocean. The state is named after the Delaware Bay, which was named after an English nobleman. Delaware is home to three counties and has a mix of urban and rural areas. It was first settled by Dutch traders in the 1600s and played a key role in the American Revolution. Today, many big companies choose to incorporate in Delaware due to its business-friendly laws.
title: Delaware
